# Ignore Library, Logs, and Temp folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/

# Ignore Auto-generated .meta files
*.meta

# Ignore PlayStation builds
*.pdb

# Ignore crash logs
crash/

# Ignore local user settings
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.vscode
